title: Zwift Masochism and Roubaix Dreams: Inside the Wild Norwegian Winter of Jonas Abrahamsen
content:
‘Sometimes I like to do something crazy’: Uno-X’s Tour de France star won’t let 5 degrees farenheit put a freeze on his cobblestone chances.

Read the full article at Zwift Masochism and Roubaix Dreams: Inside the Wild Norwegian Winter of Jonas Abrahamsen on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
